Diagnosis. A smaLL TO LarGE (UsUaLLy mEdIUm sIzEd) spECIEs wITH vEry LONG R2 HavING TypICaL
Metalycaeus
- TypE rIbs, a sHarp swELLING ON R3 aNd a UsUaLLy rOUNdEd apErTUrE. THE spECIEs sHOws a GrEaT varIabILITy aCrOss pOpULaTIONs IN TErms Of sIzE, sHELL sHapE aNd THE LENGTH Of R2.

Description of the holotype of
heudei
.
SHELL ( FIGUrE 52A ) IvOry; sHELL OUTLINE sLIGHTLy OvaTE frOm dOrsaL vIEw, spIrE sLIGHTLy ELEvaTEd; EdGE Of bOdy wHOrL rOUNdEd; prOTOCONCH ELEvaTEd, CONsIsTs Of sLIGHTLy mOrE THaN 1.75 wHOrLs, fIrsT ONE aNd a HaLf wHOrLs NEarLy smOOTH, LasT HaLf wHOrLs wITH fINE spIraL LINEs; R1 CONsIsTs Of 1.5 wHOrLs, rEGULarLy rIbbEd; rIbs wIdELy-spaCEd OvEraLL, bECOmING GradUaLLy dENsEr TOwards ENd Of R1, arEa bETwEEN rIbs wITH vEry fINE spIraL sTrUCTUrE; TraNsITION bETwEEN R1 aNd R2 NOT CONspICUOUs, bECaUsE rIbs bECOmE ONLy sLIGHTLy dENsEr; R2 wITH sHarp, wIdELy-spaCEd rIbs; CrOss sECTION Of rIbs COULd NOT bE ExamINEd, bUT prObabLy sImILar TO OTHEr
Metalycaeus
spECIEs HavING wIdELy-spaCEd rIbs; LENGTH Of R2 aNd R3 sLIGHTLy LEss THaN a HaLf wHOrL COmbINEd, R2 sLIGHTLy LONGEr THaN R3; TraNsITION bETwEEN R2 aNd R3 CLEarLy vIsIbLE dUE TO a CONspICUOUs, dEEp CONsTrICTION; R3 wITH ELEvaTEd, sTrONG swELLING, wHICH Is fINELy, dENsELy rIbbEd; arEa bETwEEN swELLING aNd apErTUrE wITH IrrEGULar GrOwTH LINEs; apErTUrE rOUNdEd; OUTEr LIp ExpaNdEd aNd sLIGHTLy rEfLECTEd, EspECIaLLy IN dIrECTION Of UmbILICUs; INNEr LIp THICkENEd aNd sLIGHTLy prOTrUdING; dIsTaNCE bETwEEN TwO LIps rELaTIvELy LarGE.
Measurements (in mm). D = 3.6–7.2, H = 2.3–4.8 (N = 32). SEE aLsO TabLE 4 .

subSubSection.paragraph: ......continued on the next page Operculum. BOTH sIdEs Of THE OpErCULUm was ExamINEd IN THE 20030318B sampLE, wHErEas ONLy THE OUTEr sIdE Has bEEN ExamINEd IN THE fOLLOwING ONEs: 20070414B, 20041107 A, 20050324B, MNHN IM-2012-27027, MNHN IM-2012-27036. THE INNEr sUrfaCE ( FIGUrEs 49C–D ) Is wITH aN ELEvaTEd NIppLE, THE OUTEr sUrfaCE Is smOOTH, aNd vEry OfTEN COvErEd by a THIN LayEr Of mUd. If IT Is CLEaN, THE OUTEr sUrfaCE Is GLOssy, smOOTH, THE mULTIspIraL sTrUCTUrE Is barELy vIsIbLE, Or NOT vIsIbLE aT aLL.

Variation in specimens.
Metalycaeus heudei Is
a vEry varIabLE spECIEs IN sHELL sIzE, spIrE HEIGHT, LENGTH aNd sHapE (bULGING Or NOT ) Of R2 aNd THE sTrENGTH Of THE swELLING ON R3. ONE pOpULaTION (2013/16) Has aN ExTErNaLLy CrENULaTEd pErIsTOmE, wHICH Is rOUNdEd IN THE OTHErs. VarIabILITy wITHIN pOpULaTION Is LOw, aLTHOUGH mOsT avaILabLE sampLEs CONTaINEd fEw sHELLs. TabLE 4 COmpILEs THE varIabLE TraITs aNd THEIr CHaraCTEr sTaTEs IN ExamINEd pOpULaTIONs. SEE aLsO rEmarks.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Differential diagnosis.
Metalycaeus muciferus LaCks
THE swELLING ON R3 aNd Has mUCH sHOrTEr R2.
Metalycaeus libonensis Has
a sHOrTEr R2, aNd R3, aNd THE swELLING Of R3 Is sITUaTEd mUCH CLOsEr TO THE pErIsTOmE THaN IN
M. heudei
. MOrEOvEr, THE apErTUrE Of
M. libonensis Is
mOrE ObLIqUE ( THE UppEr parT Of THE pErIsTOmE Is mOrE prOTrUdING aNTErIOrLy) THaN THaT Of
M. heudei
. SEE aLsO UNdEr
M. oharai
n. sp.
aNd
M. latecostatus
.

Distribution.
Alycaeus heudei Is
wIdELy dIsTrIbUTEd frOm NOrTHErN VIETNam (
NINH BINH PrOvINCE
) aNd NOrTHErN LaOs ( LUaNG PrabaNG PrOvINCE ) TO THE CHINEsE YUNNaN , HUNaN aNd HUbEI prOvINCEs. MOsT pOpULaTIONs arE kNOwN frOm NOrTHErN VIETNam aNd GUaNGxI ( FIGUrE 54 ).

Remarks. THE HOLOTypE Of
Chamalycaeus fractus Is
damaGEd. AfTEr fINIsHING THE drawING Of THE HOLOTypE , wHICH was pUbLIsHEd IN THE OrIGINaL dEsCrIpTION, a COLLEaGUE Of ANdrás VarGa sTEppEd ON THE sHELL by aCCIdENT. As a rEsULT, THE apEx aNd apErTUraL rEGION Of THE sINGLE kNOwN sHELLs was brOkEN. THE rEmaINING apprOxImaTELy ONE wHOrL Of THE HOLOTypE Is dEpOsITEd IN THE HNHM (A. VarGa, pErs. COmm., JULy 2014 ). WE ExamINEd THaT sHELL fraGmENT, bUT IT dId NOT prOvIdE ENOUGH INfOrmaTION. THE drawING prEsENTEd IN THE OrIGINaL dEsCrIpTION ( FIGUrE 52E ), HOwEvEr, Is dETaILEd ENOUGH TO dECIdE THE TaxONOmIC sTaTUs Of
C. fractus
. MOrEOvEr, wE ExamINEd spECImENs sUbsEqUENTLy COLLECTEd aT THE samE LOCaLITy ( NHMUK 19991434, FIGUrE 52D ).

WE fOUNd NO NOTabLE dIffErENCEs bETwEEN THE HOLOTypEs Of
A. paviei
aNd
A. paviei var. minor
( FIGUrEs 51A–B ) ExCEpT fOr THE sIzE, THErEfOrE THE LaTTEr Is NOT a dIffErENT TaxON. TypICaL
A. heudei
( FIGUrE 52A ) Has a LOwEr spIrE aNd a sHOrTEr R2 THaN TypICaL
A. paviei
. THEsE dIffErENCEs arE, HOwEvEr, NOT sTabLE aCrOss pOpULaTIONs. SOmE pOpULaTIONs sHOw INTErmEdIaTE CHaraCTEr sTaTEs bETwEEN
A. heudei
aNd
A. paviei
IN TErms Of bOTH spIrE HEIGHT aNd TUbE LENGTH, wHErEas OTHEr sHELLs arE sImILar TO ONE TaxON IN ONE CHaraCTEr, bUT TO THE OTHEr TaxON IN THE OTHEr TraIT ( TabLE 4 ). THE HOLOTypE Of
C. compressicosta
( FIGUrE 50B ) dIffErs frOm THE HOLOTypE Of
A. paviei
by THE sHOrTEr aNd LEss bULGING R2 aNd a LEss ELEvaTEd spIrE. TypICaL
A. heudei
spECImENs dIffEr frOm THE HOLOTypE Of
C. compressicosta
by THE fLaTTEr sHELL aNd LOwEr swELLING ON R3. NONE Of THE dIffErENCEs bETwEEN THE HOLOTypEs Of
C. compressicosta
,
A. heudei
aNd
A. paviei
arE sTabLE aCrOss pOpULaTIONs, aNd THErEfOrE, sUffICIENT TO dIffErENTIaTE
C. compressicosta
frOm THE TwO OTHEr fOrms. THE drawING Of THE HOLOTypE Of
C. fractus
aNd THE spECImEN COLLECTEd IN THE samE LOCaLITy sHOw NO NOTabLE dIffErENCEs frOm TypICaL
A. paviei
sHELLs. As a CONsEqUENCE,
A. paviei
,
A. paviei var. minor
,
C. compressicosta
aNd
C. fractus
arE jUNIOr syNONyms Of
A. heudei
. THE TypE spECImENs Of
Alycaeus zhuangiyucuii
wErE NOT ExamINEd by Us. THE pHOTOs prEsENTEd IN THE OrIGINaL dEsCrIpTION ( FIGUrE 51D ), HOwEvEr, CLEarLy sHOw THaT
A. zhuangiyucuii Is
IdENTICaL wITH
Alycaeus paviei
, aNd THErEfOrE, syNONym Of
Alycaeus heudei
.

ACCOrdING TO SCHILEykO (2011) BaN LaO (TypE LOCaLITy Of
Alycaeus paviei
aNd
A. paviei var. minor
) Is sITUaTEd IN LaOs (19°39'N, 103°19'E). HOwEvEr, THIs CITy (?) Is LOCaTEd prObabLy sOmEwHErE aLONG THE CHINEsE bOrdEr IN NOrTHErN TONkIN, bECaUsE IT Is UsUaLLy mENTIONEd as "BaN LaO, TONkIN". FUrTHErmOrE, prObabLy aLL sampLEs frOm BaN LaO OrIGINaTEd frOm COLONEL MEssaGEr, wHO, TO OUr kNOwLEdGE, dId NOT COLLECT IN LaOs, bUT was aN aCTIvE COLLECTOr aLONG THE NOrTHErN bOrdEr Of TONkIN. THErEfOrE, "BaN LaO" sENsU SCHILEykO (2011) Is NOT INdICaTEd ON OUr map.
